item.title: How do i make a safe pk

if u know where to add safe zones, under: heightLevel == 1)
return true;
else
return false;

add:

}
public boolean funPk() {
if ((absX >= 2494 && absX <= 2523 && absY >= 4713 && absY <= 4733)
|| (absX >= 2494 && absX <= 2523 && absY >= 4713 && absY <= 4733)
|| heightLevel == 1) {
return true;
} else {
return false;
}
}
